availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel A. Miller (Calloway County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Calloway County, Kentucky, farmer. South Carolina native. Son of Joseph Miller and Mary Miller. Resident of Calloway County, Kentucky, in 1850. Attended school in Calloway County in 1860. Household owned four enslaved persons in Calloway County in 1860. Farmer in Calloway County in June 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Calloway County, District 1, p. 464A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Calloway County, p. 193.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Calloway County, p. 227A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Calloway County, KY, June 1863, p. 31.
"Samuel Alexander Miller (1840-1880)," Find A Grave, Memorial 24794734, accessed May 15, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/24794734.
